title: Social Constructivist-Based MOOC Forum Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing social interaction for mathematical problem-solving in digital device-supported environments

learning_goals: Learners can establish collaborative problem-solving strategies with peers by applying MOOC forum design principles
Learners can design and operate online discussion structures based on social constructivist theory
Learners can develop an assessment rubric that systematically incorporates peer feedback in the process of explaining mathematical concepts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
